JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Digital Marketing Agent, Barcelona, Spain
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Danish speaking Digital Marketing Agent, Barcelona, Spain.

Enjoy Spain and advance your career!

Jump inte the vibrant energy of Barcelona – a city known for its stunning architecture, rich culture, and Mediterranean lifestyle. From its beautiful beaches to its renowned food scene, Barcelona offers the perfect balance of work and leisure.

Work as Danish Digital Marketing Agent in Barcelona, you’ll help businesses optimize their digital advertising strategies and achieve measurable growth. In this dynamic, international environment, your expertise in Google Ads will drive success for clients, all while enjoying the unique atmosphere of one of Europe’s most exciting cities. Live, work, and grow in Barcelona – where every day brings new opportunities!

Your purpose

You will become a specialist advisor for Danish companies in relation to their online advertising campaigns, with the opportunity of having a significant impact on their business. It is a target-driven environment, where you will work towards individual sales targets as well as being part of a larger sales team increasing the Client customer base across EMEA. You will be part of the largest team that creates unique customer experiences while actively affecting the Danish online marketing environment.

Some of your responsibilities:
  • Act as a trusted advisor to Norwegian companies, guiding them in creating and optimizing digital advertising campaigns.
  • Identify business opportunities, recommend appropriate solutions, and help clients achieve measurable results.
  • Work towards individual sales targets while contributing to the overall success of the team.
  • Continuously analyze client needs and the effectiveness of campaigns, making data-driven adjustments to improve performance.
  • Collaborate with other team members to grow the client base and increase market presence across EMEA.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends and technologies to provide cutting-edge solutions to clients


Your benefits:
  • Full-time position (39h per week, Monday to Friday) with a Permanent Contract
  • Attractive salary conditions: from 23.876,19€ up to 30.000€ gross/year, plus a Sales bonus package: up to 3.407,96€ – 3.500€ gross/year
  • Hybrid working model in Barcelona
  • Relocation package: Includes flight ticket, 1-month accommodation, and private health insurance support
  • 3 weeks of intense training on Google Ads and specific sales training, with ongoing coaching for personal and professional development
  • Career growth opportunities: Established career path, continuous training, certifications within Google products, and fun contests


Who we are looking for:
  • Very good level of Danish
  • Ability to speak and write English fluently and idiomatically.
  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 6 months -1 Year of experience in advertising, PPC Campaigns
  • 6 months – 1 year of experience in outbound sales (preferably B2B)
  • A team player with strong leadership, analytical and communication skills.
  • Passionate about Marketing, technology, and online Advertising, with a desire to learn and develop.
  • If you don’t meet all the requirements, apply anyway! We will be delighted to meet you and find out what may be the best position for you!


Why Spain?

Living and working in Barcelona offers the perfect blend of culture, history, and modern lifestyle. Known for its iconic architecture, scenic beaches, and vibrant creative scene, Barcelona is an ideal destination for both expats and professionals seeking career growth and personal enrichment. With its high quality of life, affordable housing, excellent public transportation, and welcoming international community, this Mediterranean city promises an unforgettable experience. Whether you’re soaking up the sun along the coastline, exploring Barcelona’s thriving arts and cultural scene, this dynamic city offers the perfect work-life balance. Experience the best of both worlds—work and play—in Barcelona!

This is our client!

Our client is a world leader in customer experience management and business process outsourcing, with over 420,000 employees across 88 countries, supporting clients in more than 265 languages and industries. Their mission is to deliver exceptional service while fostering a motivating and inspiring work environment. In Spain, they have over 4,700 employees across 10 sites, recognized as a Great Place to Work and Top Employer. They are currently seeking a creative, data-driven Campaign Specialist to join their innovative team. This is your chance to be part of a company where people are at the center of everything they do!

Don’t wait – apply in 30 seconds and our team will connect with you within 48 hours!

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/danish-digital-marketing-agent-for-google-ads-products-spain-%e2%ad%90%ef%b8%8f/
